title: Padmavati: Makers ‘again’ clarify that there are no scenes between Padmavati and Alauddin Khilji | bollywood | Hindustan Times
text:
Padmavati: Makers ‘again’ clarify that there are no scenes between Padmavati and Alauddin Khilji bollywood Updated: Feb 11, 2017 09:34 IST New Delhi The shooting of Padmavati was stopped at the Jaigarh Fort in Jaipur. 
Things turned sour for Sanjay Leela Bhansali when Rajput Karni Sena protested against the director and his film Padmavati and since then, the makers have been trying their best to clarify that there’s no sequence between Rani Padmavati and Alauddin Khilji in the flick. Read more
